dcterms:description: The Decay Total Absorption Spectrometer (DTAS) is utilized for total absorption spectroscopy measurements, allowing for the detection of entire decay cascades in nuclear physics research.
dcterms:title: Decay Total Absorption Spectrometer (DTAS)

dcterms:description: The Modular Total Absorption Spectrometer (MTAS) is designed for total absorption spectroscopy, providing enhanced measurement capabilities for nuclear decay processes.
dcterms:title: Modular Total Absorption Spectrometer (MTAS)

dcterms:description: The SuN (Summing NaI(Tl)) Detector is a gamma-ray detector used for capture reaction measurements, providing insights into nuclear reactions and decay processes.
dcterms:title: SuN (Summing NaI(Tl)) Detector

dcterms:description: The GEANT4 Simulation Package is a toolkit for the simulation of the passage of particles through matter, widely used in various fields including nuclear physics and radiation detection.
dcterms:title: GEANT4 Simulation Package
